title: The Republican party of the mid-1850s - platform

content.question: The Republican party originated in the mid-1850â€™s as a sectional party committed to which of the following?

choices.label: Opposition to the further extension of slavery into the territories
Acknowledgement of popular sovereignty as the basis for organizing federal territories

content.answer: Opposition to the further extension of slavery into the territories

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
